Context: The Rainbow Connection is a safer space on campus for exploring issues related to coming out and microaggressions in the workplace, among other things. They offer group mentorship programs where peer mentors help students navigate wellness and provide support. Students can learn more about Peer Mentor+ wellness programs and register by signing up now. The contact information is 416-415-2000 for voice calls, TTY: 1-877-515-5559 for text telephony, and ask.george@georgebrown.ca for emails. George Brown College's social media hub can also be visited. The information on the website is subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
